#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int infi=32000;

int main(){
	int empty,filled,bag_weight;
	int num;
	cin>>num;
	int coins;
	for(int i=0;i<num;i++){
		cin>>empty>>filled;
		bag_weight=filled-empty;
		cin>>coins;
		int weight[coins],value[coins];
		for(int j=0;j<coins;j++){
			cin>>value[j]>>weight[j];
		}
		// cout<<"came here"<<endl;
		int answer[bag_weight+1];
		for (int q = 0; q < bag_weight+1; ++q){
			  answer[q] = -1;
		}
		answer[0]=0;
		for(int j=1;j<=bag_weight;j++){
			int min=infi;
			for(int k=0;k<coins;k++){
				if(j-weight[k]<0)continue;
				if(answer[j-weight[k]]==-1)continue;
				if(value[k]+answer[j-weight[k]]<=min)min=value[k]+answer[j-weight[k]];
			}
			if(min==infi)answer[j]=-1;
			else answer[j]=min;
		}
		// for(int j=0;j<=bag_weight;j++){
		// 	cout<<answer[j]<<" ";
		// }
		// cout<<endl;
		if(answer[bag_weight]==-1)cout<<"This is impossible."<<endl;
		else cout<<"The minimum amount of money in the piggy-bank is "<<answer[bag_weight]<<"."<<endl;
	}

}
